Text.Name: Mood_BigFish
Text.Desc: Just caught a big fish and it felt good.
Text.StoryDesc: Catching a big fish and it felt really nice

Text.Name: Mood_BigBigFish
Text.Desc: Just caught a giant fish and it felt good.
Text.StoryDesc: Catching a giant fish and it felt very nice

Text.Name: Mood_BeFished
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling a bit angry for being caught
